mapper.select: SELECT b.board_pk, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_categoryNum, b.board_subCategoryNum, b.user_pk, bf.boardFiles_pk, bf.boardFiles_oriName, bf.boardFiles_reName, bf.boardFiles_size FROM board b LEFT JOIN boardFiles bf ON b.board_pk = bf.board_pk

SELECT b.board_pk, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_categoryNum, b.board_subCategoryNum, b.user_pk, bf.boardFiles_pk, bf.boardFiles_oriName, bf.boardFiles_reName, bf.boardFiles_size FROM board b LEFT JOIN boardFiles bf ON b.board_pk = bf.board_pk WHERE b.board_categoryNum = #{board_categoryNum} AND b.board_subCategoryNum = #{board_subCategoryNum}
SELECT boardFiles_pk, boardFiles_oriName, boardFiles_reName, boardFiles_size, board_pk FROM boardFiles where board_pk=#{board_pk}

SELECT b.board_pk, b.board_title, b.board_content,c.categoryName,s.subCategoryName,b.user_pk FROM board b INNER JOIN category c ON b.board_categoryNum = c.categoryNum INNER JOIN subCategory s ON b.board_subCategoryNum = s.subCategoryNum WHERE b.board_pk = #{board_pk} GROUP BY b.board_pk
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( board_title, board_content, board_categoryNum, board_subCategoryNum, user_pk ) VALUES( #{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{board_categoryNum}, #{board_subCategoryNum}, #{user_pk} )

SELECT max(board_pk) from board
INSERT INTO boardfiles( boardFiles_oriName, boardFiles_reName, boardFiles_size, board_pk ) VALUES
( #{board.boardFiles_oriName}, #{board.boardFiles_reName}, #{board.boardFiles_size}, #{board_pk} )
mapper.select: SELECT b.board_pk, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_categoryNum, b.board_subCategoryNum, b.user_pk, bf.boardFiles_pk, bf.boardFiles_oriName, bf.boardFiles_reName, bf.boardFiles_size FROM board b LEFT JOIN boardFiles bf ON b.board_pk = bf.board_pk where b.board_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{item}, '%')
